newScannedThrough: Feb 2026 (10 Breakthrough Technologies 2026 issue + enterprise AI strategy pieces)

newContent.title: The crucial first step for designing a successful enterprise AI system
newContent.notes: Mistral AI methodology: identify 'iconic use case' as foundation for AI transformation. Four criteria: strategic, urgent, impactful, feasible. Key stat: only 2% of senior execs rate their orgs highly on delivering AI results. 7% have deployed genAI widely despite 2/3 having deployed it somewhere.

newContent.title: Rethinking AI's future in an augmented workplace
newContent.notes: Vanguard research: 'AI has potential to be GPT that lifts productivity, reshapes industries, augments human work rather than displaces it.' Workplace augmentation framing.

newContent.title: Generative coding: 10 Breakthrough Technologies 2026
newContent.notes: Key stat: AI now writes ~30% of Microsoft's code, >25% of Google's code (per company heads). Professional devs and novices using AI coding assistants to produce, test, edit, debug.

newContent.title: Hyperscale AI data centers: 10 Breakthrough Technologies 2026
newContent.notes: Infrastructure breakthrough: supersized data centers as 'new species of infrastructure' to fuel AI race. Relevant to resource allocation decisions.

newContent.title: What's next for AI in 2026
newContent.notes: DeepSeek R1 release; Chinese open models gaining ground. Prediction: Silicon Valley apps quietly shipping on Chinese open models. Regulatory tug-of-war between White House and states.

newContent.title: Building a high performance data and AI organization (2nd edition)
newContent.notes: Key stat: 98% of companies feel increased urgency; 85% believe <18 months to deploy AI strategy or negative effects. Only 13% globally say ready to leverage AI fully. Essential capabilities: compute, network, cybersecurity, observability, data quality, AI-focused culture and talent.

newContent.title: America's coming war over AI regulation
newContent.notes: Regulatory landscape: Trump exec order Dec 11 to limit state AI laws. States vs federal battle. Court battleground for AI regulation in 2026.

newContent.title: Mechanistic interpretability: 10 Breakthrough Technologies 2026
newContent.notes: New techniques giving researchers glimpse at AI model inner workings. Relevant to AI safety/governance organizational structures.

summary: First scan of MIT Technology Review. Strong 2026 coverage with 10 Breakthrough Technologies issue (Jan 12) and enterprise AI strategy pieces. Key organizational findings: (1) Only 2% of execs rate AI results highly; 7% have scaled genAI widely despite 66% having deployed somewhere—scaling gap confirmed. (2) AI writing 25-30% of code at Microsoft/Google—major workforce integration signal. (3) 98% companies feel urgency, 85% believe <18 months to deploy or face negative effects—time pressure driving structural decisions. (4) Mistral AI 'iconic use case' methodology: strategic, urgent, impactful, feasible criteria for AI transformation starting point. (5) Vanguard research: AI as 'augmentation not displacement' GPT framing.

extractedFindings.finding: AI code generation at scale in big tech
extractedFindings.detail: AI now writes approximately 30% of Microsoft's code and more than 25% of Google's code, according to the heads of those companies.

extractedFindings.source: MIT Tech Review - Enterprise AI System Design
extractedFindings.detail: Only 2% of senior executives rate their organizations highly on delivering AI results. While two-thirds have deployed generative AI, only 7% have done so widely.

extractedFindings.source: MIT Tech Review - High Performance Data & AI Org
extractedFindings.detail: 98% of companies feel increased urgency; 85% believe they have less than 18 months to deploy AI strategy or face negative business effects. Only 13% globally say they are ready.

extractedFindings.source: MIT Tech Review - Enterprise AI System Design (Mistral AI)
extractedFindings.detail: Mistral AI methodology starts by identifying an 'iconic use case' with four criteria: strategic, urgent, impactful, and feasible. 'Choosing the right use case can mean the difference between true transformation and endless tinkering and testing.'
extractedFindings.mechanism: Use case selection for AI transformation
